original_text: There are many things that I want to say. The spirit inside me causes me to speak. There are many things that I want to say.
korean_text: 내 속에는 말이 가득하니 내 영이 나를 압박함이니라

sentences.original_text: There are many things that I want to say
The spirit inside me causes me to speak
sentences.korean_translation: 내 안에 있는 영이 나로 말하게 한다

sentences.original_text: There are many things that I want to say
